def esrever(s):
    return s[:-1][::-1] + s[-1] if s else ''

def esrever(string):
    return string and string[-2::-1] + string[-1]

def esrever(s):
    return s and " ".join(x[::-1] for x in reversed(s[:-1].split())) + s[-1]

def esrever(string):
    return string[-2::-1] + string[-1] if string else ""

def esrever(s):
    return '' if not s else s[:-1][::-1]+s[-1]
